sources.title: Secret Ninja Roaring Tiger
sources.description: Dragon Kong, a martial-arts champion, begins his most dangerous quest so far. Tiger, a legendary fighter, has kidnapped Susan, daughter of the millionaire who holds martial arts contests, and an unbelievable truth begins to reveal itself.

metadata.Plot: Dragon Kong, a victor of a millionaire's martial-arts contest, is about to begin the most dangerous mission of his life. For his prize, the millionaire's ravishing daughter Susan, has been stolen - kidnapped by a Ninja sect headed by Tiger So. a legendary Ninjitsu super-foot. Why tiger has taken Susan, Dragon can only guess, but as the shocking truth begins to dawn, and the final showdown approaches, the violence of the Ninja reaches its fatal peak.
metadata.Actors: Ryong Keo, Jeong-lee Hwang, Jeong-ah Seo
